title: Android 13 might revamp screen savers with info overlays
content:
Google released the second Developer Preview of Android 13 last week, which contained plenty of changes and new features â€” some of which aren’t quite ready for prime time yet. The update includes code that points to a future revamp for Android’s built-in screen savers, which could arrive in later beta releases or the final

The post Android 13 might revamp screen savers with info overlays appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 might revamp the operating system's screen saver support with more options and new widget-like info panels.
